origin: Here we will learn to extract some frequently used properties of objects like Solidity, Equivalent Diameter, Mask image, Mean Intensity etc. More features can be found at
local: 在这里，我们将学习提取物体的一些常用属性，如坚固性、等效直径、掩模图像、平均强度等。更多的特征可以在

origin: *(NB : Centroid, Area, Perimeter etc also belong to this category, but we have seen it in last chapter)*
local: *（注意：质心、面积、周长等也属于这一类，但我们在上一章中已经看到）*

origin: It is the ratio of width to height of bounding rect of the object.
local: 它是对象边界矩形的宽度与高度之比。

origin: Extent is the ratio of contour area to bounding rectangle area.
local: 范围是等高线面积与边框面积之比。

origin: Solidity is the ratio of contour area to its convex hull area.
local: 坚固性是等高线面积与其凸面外壳面积之比。

origin: Equivalent Diameter is the diameter of the circle whose area is same as the contour area.
local: 等效直径是面积与等高线面积相同的圆的直径。

origin: Orientation is the angle at which object is directed. Following method also gives the Major Axis and Minor Axis lengths.
local: 方向是物体被指向的角度。下面的方法也给出了长轴和短轴的长度。

origin: In some cases, we may need all the points which comprises that object. It can be done as follows:
local: 在某些情况下，我们可能需要组成该对象的所有点。具体做法如下：

origin: Here, two methods, one using Numpy functions, next one using OpenCV function (last commented line) are given to do the same. Results are also same, but with a slight difference. Numpy gives coordinates in **(row, column)** format, while OpenCV gives coordinates in **(x,y)** format. So basically the answers will be interchanged. Note that,
local: 这里给出了两种方法，一种使用Numpy函数，另一种使用OpenCV函数（最后一行注释）来实现相同的功能。结果也一样，但略有不同。Numpy以**（行，列）**格式给出坐标，OpenCV以**（x，y）**格式给出坐标。所以基本上答案会互换。注意，

origin: 7. Maximum Value, Minimum Value and their locations
We can find these parameters using a mask image.
local: 我们可以使用掩模图像找到这些参数。

origin: Here, we can find the average color of an object. Or it can be average intensity of the object in grayscale mode. We again use the same mask to do it.
local: 在这里，我们可以找到物体的平均颜色。也可以是灰度模式下物体的平均强度。我们又用同样的面具来做。

origin: Extreme Points means topmost, bottommost, rightmost and leftmost points of the object.
local: 极值点是指物体的最上面、最下面、最右边和最左边的点。
